name: Covid Crusher (No Downloads)
description:
Key The Covid!

Covid Crusher!

Crush viruses under your mighty keys as you try to stop a global pandemic! Watch the viruses change in type as new ones come for your keys! This was my first game jam, and Keira did the art. Ideas from Brook and help from Ben. Lab tileset by FinalBossBlues. 

This was my first time using construct, so it was written with extremely bad code.
